channel.title: Edge on SDN-Warrior | Daniel Krieger

item.title: VCF9 - Dark Site Edge
item.description:
Introduction

I haven’t written anything in a while, and I need to change that here with another niche topic. I want to take a closer look at VCF9 Edge. This does not refer to the Edge cluster in NSX; no, VCF Edge is a special form of a VCF instance. VCF offers nine complete designs for this form, and I would like to take a closer look at one special version â€” the so-called Dak Site Edge.
